Commands.Fist: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Small Attack Up for 2 turns.
Commands.Raijin Special: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Small Max BRV Up and Thunder stance for 3 turns.

Passives.Fist Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Fist.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Raijin Special Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Raijin Special.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Fist Charge: Increases the max uses of Fist by 1.
Passives.High Tension: Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Raijin Special Charge: Increases the max uses of Raijin Special by 1.
Passives.The Roaring Lightning: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV while in Thunder stance.
Passives.Thunder Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while Thunder stance is active.
Passives.Fist Extend: Increases Fist's max uses by 1.Slightly raises the potency of Fist and Fist+.Slightly raises the potency of Physical Attack Up and extends its duration by 2 turns.Triggers an HP attack when BRV is over 80% Max BRV.
Passives.Thunder Attack All: Slightly raises party's Attack while Thunder stance is active.
Passives.Raijin Special Extend: Increases the max uses of Raijin Special by 2.Tremendously raises its total potency.Slightly raises the potency of Max BRV Up.BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 150% of Max BRV.Slightly raises the potency of BRV Attack+.

Weapons.Iron Crush Bar CP: 35: Increases the potency of Raijin Special and Raijin Special+ and lowers their Action Delay.Inflicts Thunder Resistance Down for 4 turns.Increases the potency of Max BRV Up and extends its duration.Extends the duration of Thunder stance.
Weapons.Raijin's Club CP: 15: Increases the potency of Fist and Fist+.Lowers the Action Delay of the latter.Increases the potency of Physical Attack Up, extends its duration and grants it to allies as well.
